H0.text: Which counter-intelligence agency had a name meaning ‘death to spies’ in English. Abwehr

H1.text: Which counter-intelligence agency had a name meaning ‘death to spies’ in English. Mossad

H2.text: Which counter-intelligence agency had a name meaning ‘death to spies’ in English. Stasi

H3.text: Which counter-intelligence agency had a name meaning ‘death to spies’ in English. СМЕРШ

A4.text: Joseph Stalin coined the name СМЕРШ (SMERSH) as a portmanteau of the Russian-language phrase Смерть шпионам (Smertʹ shpionam, 'Death to spies').

A5.text: SMERSH was an umbrella organization for three independent counter-intelligence agencies in the Red Army.
